title: International ice patrol
creator_credit: Affiliated Film Producers and Henwar Rodakiewicz
brief_description: Shows how the US Coast Guard, operating under international agreements, patrols the North Atlantic shipping lanes in search of icebergs, and issues warnings to ships. Illustrates through a portrayal of the cutter Mendota’s search for Iceberg No. 39 in June 1947.
